content: X-HSN 24 Metal deck fasteners (collated) Collated nails for fastening metal decks to bar joists with stand-up powder-actuated nailers ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Nails- - - ### FEATURES:Features A much faster and safer fastening system compared to welding No risk of burn-through – little to no painting re-work needed The unique design helps HSN 24 nails covers its full application range with red cartridges Can be used on epoxy-coated or galvanized joists with little risk of zinc fumes Performs well in inclement weather conditions Applications Fastening metal roof decks to 1/8 to 3/8 thick bar joists Fastening metal floor decks to 1/8 to 3/8 bar joists and light-gauge steel structures For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Steel Minimum thickness of base material (steel): 1/8 in Corrosion protection: Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm Technical Data | Base materials | Steel | Minimum thickness of base material (steel) | 1/8 in | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Material | Carbon steel | Fastener shank diameter | 0.16 in | Washer size | 15/32 in | Point type | Ballistic point | Approvals | ABS, COLA, FM, IAPMO, ICC-ES, LR, SDI, UL | For use with (tools) | DX 9 | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 3511817 - Kit X-HSN 24+6.8/11M Red - Package Size 1 pc - 2042971 - Sheet metal nail X-HSN 24 - Package Size 1000 pc - 3526477 - KIT X-HSN 24 + 6.8/11 M40 (2K) BLK - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 2000x Sheet metal nail X-HSN 24 - 2000x DX Cartridge 6.8/11 M40 X10 B black - 3605213 - KIT X-HSN 24+6.8/11 M40 (2K) RED - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 2000x Sheet metal nail X-HSN 24 - 2000x DX Cartridge 6.8/11 M40 red - 3605214 - KIT X-HSN 24+6.8/11 M40 (15K) RED - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 15000x Sheet metal nail X-HSN 24 - 15000x DX Cartridge 6.8/11 M40 red - 3605216 - KIT X-HSN 24+6.8/11 M40+PB (15K) RED - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 15000x Sheet metal nail X-HSN 24 - 15000x DX Cartridge 6.8/11 M40 red - 1x Piston X-9-HSN kit - 3669173 - KIT X-HSN24+6.8/11 M40- 30K/31K RED - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 30000x Sheet metal nail X-HSN 24 - 31000x DX Cartridge 6.8/11 M40 red - 3668998 - KIT X-HSN 24+6.8/11 M40+PB 30K/31K RED - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 30000x Sheet metal nail X-HSN 24 - 31000x DX Cartridge 6.8/11 M40 red - 2x Piston X-9-HSN kit - 3605215 - KIT X-HSN 24+6.8/11 M40 (30K) RED - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 30000x Sheet metal nail X-HSN 24 - 30000x DX Cartridge 6.8/11 M40 red - 3605217 - KIT X-HSN 24+6.8/11 M40+PB (30K) RED -
